Title: Day of the Dead
Actors: Lori Cardille, Terry Alexander, Joseph Pilato, Jarlath Conroy
Plot: As the world is overrun by zombies, a small group of scientists and military personal dwelling in an underground bunker in Florida must determine whether they should cure, control, educate, eliminate or escape the undead horde.
Production: Laurel-Day Inc., United Film Distribution Company (UFDC), Dead Films Inc., A Laurel. Production
